response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 ～稀有亡霊～
response.overview: This documentary horror series has been collabolated with various genres such as TV personalities, magazines, and news sites, and has over 80 titles in total! The people from the other world who appear in these images are very rare ghosts, unlike ordinary ghost images and photographs. Is this a coincidence? Or is there a special meaning?Please watch the video to find out.
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video: Rare and Unique Phantoms
